items.sentence: You don't have to wait for Tom. He isn't coming.
You know I'm still planning on going, don't you?
Who are you planning on going to Australia with?
Tom will apparently be in Australia next spring.
I think that Tom probably knows what's going on.
We're going to see if we can get Tom to help us.
Tom was sitting on the porch, playing his banjo.
I've been a member of this club for a long time.
Tom was kind enough to drive me to the hospital.
Tom didn't want Mary to find out what he'd done.
I assume that you don't need to do that anymore.
We need to get more signatures on this petition.
Tom isn't interested in going to Boston with us.
I didn't know whether I wanted to scream or cry.
Tom is a much better tennis player than Mary is.
Tom has no idea how his behavior affects others.
I had to plead with them to allow me to do that.
What kinds of things do you do with your family?
I got off the elevator and went to Tom's office.
Tom broke into our house and stole some jewelry.
